newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Tong Yang Mool San to absorb subsidiary.
newsitem.headline: Tong Yang Mool San to absorb subsidiary.

text.p: South Korean farm machinery maker Tong Yang Mool San Co has decided to absorb an unlisted subsidiary, the Securities Supervisory Board said on Thursday.
Chang Shin Machinery Co, 100 percent owned by Tong Yang, will be fully absorbed on September 30, the board said in a statement.
The merger was aimed at improving competitiveness by integrating the two companies, now engaged in similar business lines, the statement said.
